activities: True Partners Consulting LLC (“True Partners”) may use personal information regarding current, former and prospective managing directors and employees for the operation and management of True Partners, human resource administration, and maintaining contact with individuals. True Partners may use personal information regarding current, former, and prospective clients and their personnel or others for the delivery of True Partners’ services, ongoing relationship management, and business development activities. True Partners uses personal information regarding third parties and their personnel in connection with the management and administration of the business relationships with such third parties. Additionally, True Partners may from time to time, collect personal information from the general public in order to answer inquiries or provide information requested.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data in electronic and paper format collected from current, former, and prospective True Partners’ managing directors and employees, clients, and other third parties.
recoursemech: True Partners uses the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for Human Resources information complaints. For all other complaints, True Partners uses JAMS.
